description.p: This dagger has a bright blade with a faint deep red glow hinting at its danger.
You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls. The blade also deals +5 fire damage and It can set common objects on fire.
This dagger has a black blade with a silver lining at it's edge and a jagged blue bolt engraved into the center.
You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls. The blade also deals 1d6 lightning damage and will paralyse an enemy upon rolling a 20 to-hit.
